ruleBookInfo.author: b
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>(()=>{
let bk=JSON.parse(java.getZipStringContent(result,'detail.json')).data;
return {
a:bk.name,
b:bk.author,
c:java.timeFormat(new Date(bk.chapterUpdateTime).getTime()),
d:bk.wordNum,
e:bk.chapterName,
f:bk.intro,
g:bk.picture
};
})()
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: a

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(result.indexOf("404 Not Found")!=-1){result="";}
result</js>##一秒记住.*免费阅读！
